comments:
3.2 RC5

If Form.setBusy is called with false the first time, it fails with an NPE because the label hasn't been created:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.forms.widgets.FormHeading.setBusy(FormHeading.java:1137)
	at org.eclipse.ui.forms.widgets.Form.setBusy(Form.java:555)
<snip>

Although the implementation of the FormHeading has changed a lot since 3.2, the bug is still there :-).

Fixed.
